item.description: Overview As I have mentioned in the previous blog, lots of technologies the Kubernetes relies on are created with the help of the operating system. For example, the container is the specific process that corporates with the CGroup and Linux Namespace on OS. However, there is another essential OS concept used in Kubernetes: process group. It means one process group includes several processes. Those kinds of processes have a super affinity relationship.
